name: Steam Headless
description: Steam Headless is a Docker-based solution that provides remote access to Steam gaming environment via web browser with hardware acceleration support for gaming performance.

notes.text: Requires privileged container for optimal hardware acceleration and device access
VNC access available on port 5900 for direct desktop access
SSH/SFTP access on port 22 for file management (user: steam, password: password)
SECURITY: Change default password immediately after installation!
System automatically optimized for gaming performance with kernel tuning and resource limits
Game library stored in /opt/steam-headless/games, user data in /opt/steam-headless/home
Management scripts available: steam-headless-start, steam-headless-stop, steam-headless-restart, steam-headless-logs, steam-headless-update
Hardware acceleration configured automatically for supported graphics cards
